query.ejb-ql: SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Office o WHERE o.number = ?1 AND o.officeManager_number = ?2 AND o.zoneNumber = ?3
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Office o WHERE o.defaultCarrier_number = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Office o WHERE o.mainWarehouse_number = ?1 AND o.zoneNumber = ?2
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Delivery o WHERE o.type_number = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Delivery o WHERE o.carrier_number = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Delivery o WHERE o.invoice_year = ?1 AND o.invoice_number = ?2
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Delivery o
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Product o WHERE 1 = 1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM DeliveryPlace o WHERE o.customer_number = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM DeliveryPlace o WHERE o.preferredWarehouse_number = ?1 AND o.preferredWarehouse_zoneNumber = ?2
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Seller o WHERE o.level_id = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Seller o WHERE 1 = 1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Customer o WHERE o.seller_number = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Customer o WHERE o.alternateSeller_number = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Customer o WHERE o.number = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Customer o WHERE o._Name like ?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Customer o WHERE o._Name like ?1 and o._RelationWithSeller = ?2
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Customer o WHERE o._Type = 1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Customer o WHERE o._Type = 2
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Customer o
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM InvoiceDetail o WHERE o.product_number = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM InvoiceDetail o WHERE o.soldBy_number = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM InvoiceDetail o WHERE o.invoice_year = ?1 AND o.invoice_number = ?2
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Product2 o WHERE o.warehouse_number = ?1 AND o.warehouse_zoneNumber = ?2
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Product2 o WHERE o.family_number = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Product2 o WHERE o.subfamily_number = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Product2 o WHERE 1 = 1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM AdditionalDetail o WHERE o.service_number = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM AdditionalDetail o WHERE o.type_number = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM TransportCharge o WHERE o.delivery_number = ?1 AND o.delivery_type_number = ?2 AND o.delivery_invoice_year = ?3 AND o.delivery_invoice_number = ?4
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM TransportCharge o
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Invoice o WHERE o.customer_number = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Invoice o WHERE 1 = 1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Invoice o WHERE o._Paid = 'S'
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Invoice o WHERE o._Paid <> 'S'
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Product3 o WHERE o.family_oid = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Carrier o WHERE o.warehouse_number = ?1 AND o.warehouse_zoneNumber = ?2
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Carrier o WHERE o.drivingLicence_level = ?1 AND o.drivingLicence_type = ?2
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Carrier o WHERE o.warehouse_zoneNumber = ?1 AND o.warehouse_number = ?2 AND NOT (o._Number = ?3)
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Carrier o
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Subfamily2 o WHERE o.family_number = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM FilterBySubfamily o WHERE o.subfamily_number = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Receptionist o WHERE o.deliveryPlace_oid = ?1
